data.name: ReadFips1
data.value: select top(1) T1.[STATE], T1.COUNTY, T1.LOCATION, T1.COUNTY_DESC, T1.STATE_ABBREVIATION, T1.COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS T1 join CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 on (T1.LOCATION = T2.FIP_LOCATION) and (T1.COUNTY = T2.FIP_COUNTY) and (T1.[STATE] = T2.FIP_STATE) join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T3 on (T2.IDENTIFIER = T3.TRB_ID) and (T3.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId)

data.name: ReadFips2
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, COUNTY_DESC, STATE_ABBREVIATION, COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS where (COUNTY_ABBR = @countyAbbr) and (STATE_ABBREVIATION = @stateAbbreviation)

data.name: ReadFips3
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, COUNTY_DESC, STATE_ABBREVIATION, COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS where STATE_ABBREVIATION = @stateAbbreviation

data.name: ReadFips4
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, COUNTY_DESC, STATE_ABBREVIATION, COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS where (LOCATION = @location) and (COUNTY = @county) and ([STATE] = @state)

data.name: ReadFipsTribAddress1
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, COUNTRY, TRB_ID from CKT_FIPS_TRIB_ADDR where (TRB_ID = @trbId) and (COUNTRY <> ' ')

data.name: ReadFipsTribAddress2
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, COUNTRY, TRB_ID from CKT_FIPS_TRIB_ADDR where (@trbId = TRB_ID) and (COUNTRY <> ' ')

data.name: ReadFipsTribAddress3
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, COUNTRY, TRB_ID from CKT_FIPS_TRIB_ADDR where @trbId = TRB_ID

data.name: ReadLegalAction1
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, CLASSIFICATION, COURT_CASE_NO, FOREIGN_ORDER_NO, TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadLegalAction2
data.value: select distinct T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.CLASSIFICATION, T1.COURT_CASE_NO, T1.FOREIGN_ORDER_NO, T1.TRB_ID from CKT_FIPS T3 join CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 on (T1.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) and (T2.IDENTIFIER = T1.TRB_ID) on (T3.LOCATION = T2.FIP_LOCATION) and (T3.COUNTY = T2.FIP_COUNTY) and (T3.[STATE] = T2.FIP_STATE) and (T3.COUNTY_ABBR = @countyAbbr) and (T3.STATE_ABBREVIATION = @stateAbbreviation)

data.name: ReadLegalActionTribunal
data.value: select T1.LEGAL_ACTION_ID, T1.CLASSIFICATION, T1.COURT_CASE_NO, T1.FOREIGN_ORDER_NO, T1.TRB_ID, T2.JUDICIAL_DIVISION, T2.TRIBUNAL_NM, T2.FIP_LOCATION, T2.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T2.FIP_COUNTY, T2.FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T1 on (T1.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) and (T2.IDENTIFIER = T1.TRB_ID) and (T2.IDENTIFIER = @identifier)

data.name: ReadTribunal1
data.value: select top(1) T1.JUDICIAL_DIVISION, T1.TRIBUNAL_NM, T1.FIP_LOCATION, T1.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T1.IDENTIFIER, T1.FIP_COUNTY, T1.FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL T1 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T2 on (T1.IDENTIFIER = T2.TRB_ID) and (T2.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId)

data.name: ReadTribunal2
data.value: select top(1) JUDICIAL_DIVISION, TRIBUNAL_NM, FIP_LOCATION, JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, IDENTIFIER, FIP_COUNTY, FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL where IDENTIFIER = @identifier
